ComicInfo.Summary:
THROUGH HELLFIRE AND... DEADPOOL?!
Conan, Deadpool and the Night Flyer escape Riker's in the endless night during the reign of the King in Black. What crazy heist will ruin Deadpool's 30th anniversary? Here's a hint: It involves the Hellfire Club!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Valerio Giangiordano & Frank D'Armata | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Superlog | 2 | | Var | Avengers Mech Strike Variant Cover (Black Widow) | Leonel Castellani | 3 |
ComicInfo.Tags: Bishop,Deadpool,Marauders,Bar With No Name,Kulan Gath,Hellfire Club Mansion,King In Black,Night Flyer,Callisto,Iceman,Symbiotes,Conan
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Eighteen: The Night Flyer Job
